document_data.name: Olmaer Naxrin
document_data.refs2e: {{Cite web/Elminster Speaks archive|2}}{{Cite web/Elminster Speaks/Part 1: Voonlar}}
document_data.mainbody: '''Olmaer Naxrin''' was a traveling merchant that traded in [[Sembia]]. He occasionally traveled to [[Voonlar]] to oversee investments for the [[Zhentarim]].
document_data.Description: Olmaer moved with catlike grace and usually spoke quietly and diplomatically.
document_data.Personality: He was merciless when the need arose. He killed quickly and efficiently, often using poisoned weapons.
document_data.Abilities: Olmaer was both nimble and strong, and a specialist with the [[longsword]].
document_data.Possessions: He wore ''[[bracers of defense]]'', a ''[[ring of protection]]'' and wielded a longsword. He also had a [[hand crossbow]] and a poisoned [[dart]] gun.
document_data.Activities: Olmaer was an agent of the [[Zhentarim]] that traveled to [[Voonlar]] as part of his itinerary. He gathered intelligence and kept an eye on Bron [[Buorstag Hlammythyl]] and his deputies,{{Cite web/Elminster Speaks/Part 2: The Bron of Voonlar}}
